Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin

Class PinConfig

java.lang.Object
com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin.PinConfig
public abstract class PinConfig extends Object
A class to configure to PIN authenticator.
Since:
2.2.0

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_MINIMUM_LENGTH

      public static final int DEFAULT_MINIMUM_LENGTH
      Default minimum passcode length. This value defaults to 6.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_LENGTH

      public static final int DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
      Default maximum possible passcode length. This value defaults to 8.
      See Also:

  • Method Details

    • setPinRules

      public static void setPinRules(@NonNull Context context, int rules) throws IdCloudClientException
      Set the rules for acceptable PINs.
      Parameters:
      context - A context object
      rules - PIN rules. e.g. PinConfig.PinRule.LENGTH|PinConfig.PinRule.PALINDROME|PinConfig.PinRule.SERIES
      Throws:
      IdCloudClientException - exception thrown when error occurs.
      Since:
      2.2.0

    • setMaximumLength

      public static boolean setMaximumLength(int length)
      Configures the maximum possible PIN length. The maximum possible PIN length is 16 otherwise the previous value will be kept.
      Parameters:
      length - PIN length
      Returns:
      Result of setting PIN length

    • setMinimumLength

      public static boolean setMinimumLength(int length)
      Configures the minimum required PIN length. The minimum possible PIN length is 4 otherwise the previous value will be kept.
      Parameters:
      length - PIN length
      Returns:
      Result of setting PIN length
